resources.string: Should I be worried if I find a mole?

"American Academy of Dermatology. (n.d.). Melanoma FAQs. Retrieved October 7, 2017, from https://www.aad.org/media/stats/conditions/melanoma-faqs Mayo Clinic. (n.d.). Melanoma. Retrieved October 7, 2017, from http://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/melanoma/basics/definition/con-20026009 "
Melanoma is the most severe form of skin cancer, where skin cells called melanocytes become cancerous and grow uncontrollably.

While melanoma can be deadly, it is preventable if you take caution to avoid damaging sun rays and apply sunscreen when outside for a long time. Additionally, the five year survival rate for patients who were diagnosed with melanona early is 98%.
